revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-300 |revision=NRU/B7 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=Russia only |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed=360 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3235E |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=DIR-300NRUB7 |default_ssid_regex=^DIR-300NRUB7$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=90:94:E4, AC:F1:DF, BC:F6:85, C8:BE:19, C8:D3:A3 |oui_eth=90:94:E4, AC:F1:DF, BC:F6:85, C8:BE:19, C8:D3:A3 }} [http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/5/1630.html Product page (RU)] :[http://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Router/DIR-300_NRU/Description/B7/ Manuals on the '''dlink.ru''' FTP server] :[http://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Router/DIR-300_NRU/Firmware/B7/ Firmware on the '''dlink.ru''' FTP server]
"8IR300NB7A1G" (or something like that) is silkscreened on the board in the images below.
[http://www.dns-shop.ru/catalog/i155852/marshrutizator-d-link-dir-300-nru-b7.html On '''dns-shop.ru'''] and [http://www.citilink.ru/catalog/708095/?review=rev5200 on '''citilink.ru'''] :BC:F6:85 OUI
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''DIR-300NRUB7'''. :'''WiGLE''' indicates that OUIs of '''90:94:E4, AC:F1:DF, BC:F6:85, C8:BE:19, and C8:D3:A3''' are used for this SSID.
*[http://www.ptipti.ru/dir-300nru-b7-замена-flash-8mb-установка-openwrt-и-внешняя-анте/ DIR-300/NRU rev B7 on '''ptipti.ru''']
==Images== <gallery caption="from D-Link"> File:DIR-300 B7(Front).jpg|'''low-res''' angled unit front File:DIR-300 B7 Front.jpg|unit front File:DIR-300 B7 Back.jpg|unit back </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
<gallery caption="internal"> File:DlinkDIR300B7(1).jpg|board top, front File:DlinkDIR300B7(2).jpg|board bottom File:DlinkDIR300B7(3).jpg|board top, left side view File:DlinkDIR300B7(4).jpg|board top, right side view File:DlinkDIR300B7(5).jpg|board top, rear </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
